channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Disney creates an AI task force to explore the tech and cut costs: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Disney has reportedly created a task force for studying how it can incorporate AI into its operations, sources close to the matter told Reuters.

item.title: How self-sovereign identity helps users own their data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Shiba Inu lead developer Shytoshi Kusama recently unveiled plans to integrate self-sovereign identity into its projects.

item.title: Bank of England will get more power in regulating stablecoins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The United Kingdom government could rebalance the power between the Bank of England and the country’s principal financial regulator, the Financial Conduct Authority.

item.title: Two-thirds of AI Chrome extensions could endanger user security: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Data from an Incogni report revealed that 69% of AI extensions for Google Chrome have a high risk impact on users’ cybersecurity if they are breached.

item.title: Brazilian CBDC gets official name and logo
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Previously commonly referred to as the “digital real,” the Brazilian central bank digital currency gets its official brand name.

item.title: Binance sold USDC for BTC and ETH after Silvergate Bank collapse: PoR report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Binance’s depleting USDC reserves has become a hot topic in the crypto ecosystem, especially after Coinbase CEO’s quip during the company’s Q2 earning call.

item.title: Bitcoin bears ‘in control but exhausted’ as BTC price retakes $29K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin stages a recovery toward a key resistance but fails to break through, and BTC price action is giving some cause for optimism.

item.title: Bitstamp crypto exchange to raise funds for global expansion: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: One of the world’s oldest cryptocurrency exchanges, Bitstamp, is trying to scale its operations with new fundraising advised by Galaxy Digital.

item.title: PayPal stablecoin launch sparks wave of fake PYUSD tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Nearly 30 fake PYUSD tokens cropped up in the wake of PayPal’s most recent announcement.

item.title: OpenAI launches web crawler 'GPTBot' amid plans for next model: GPT-5
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: ChatGPT users have the option to scrap the web crawler by adding a “disallow” command to a standard file on the server.

item.title: Circle CEO: 70% of USDC adoption comes from outside the US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Major stablecoin issuers Tether and Circle are focusing on markets outside the United States, where adoption is growing.

item.title: Zoom updates terms after backlash, won’t train AI without consent
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Many online said they were halting the use of Zoom over terms that seemingly allowed the platform to scrape user data to train AI models.

item.title: PayPal USD: Boon for Ethereum but not decentralization, says community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Proponents say PayPal’s PYUSD could see Ethereum become the money layer of the internet, while opponents argue that it’ll act like a poorly designed central bank digital currency.

item.title: Blockchain​.com scores payment license from Singapore central bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The crypto exchange is the 12th to receive a crypto-dealing license in the country allowing it to service accredited investors and institutions.

item.title: Cypher Protocol freezes smart contract after an estimated $1M exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: A crypto wallet suspected to be tied to the exploit has gained over $1 million in SOL and UDSC since the attack.

item.title: China’s risky Bitcoin court decision, is Huobi in trouble or not? Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Man loses $10M after Chinese court rules Bitcoin lending is not protected by law, loads of Web3 founders get arrested, and Huobi rumors swirl.

item.title: BlackRock’s misguided effort to create ‘Crypto for Dummies’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Daniele Servadei
item.description: Crypto doesn’t need BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF. It undermines the basic tenets of cryptocurrency — from banking the unbanked to reducing global oppression.

item.title: Bitcoin funds see weekly outflows of $111M, most since March: CoinShares
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Solana bucked the trend, with its $9.5 million in inflows taking the top spot over the past week.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Price analysis 8/7: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin’s failure to rebound off strong support may open further downside, as bears may be tempted to sell.

item.title: FTX has a plan, but creditors are not impressed: Law Decoded
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: A body representing FTX customers said it is “extremely disappointed” by the company’s reorganization plan.

item.title: Cathie Wood predicts SEC simultaneously allows multiple spot crypto ETFs: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: ARK Investment Management is one of many firms looking for ways to offer U.S. investors exposure to crypto through exchange-traded funds.

item.title: Breaking: ‘All funds are at risk' — Steadefi exploited in ongoing attack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The leveraged yield aggregator confirmed on Aug. 7 that it was hacked and said it’s willing to discuss a bounty with the exploiters.

item.title: Hong Kong securities regulator warns of ‘criminal’ activity by unlicensed exchanges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Under the Securities and Futures Commission’s licensing regime, which started June 1, crypto firms offering services or operating in Hong Kong must comply with new requirements.

item.title: UAE signs deal to develop carbon credit system on Venom Foundation blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The UAE recently announced that it intends to reduce carbon emissions by 40% by 2030, a marked increase over its previous pledge.

item.title: Buffett and Ackman take opposing sides on Treasury yields — What does it mean for Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Two investment moguls are betting on different directions for inflation and Treasury yields, with potentially negative impacts on Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin faces ‘endless spot selling’ as BTC price dips below $28.7K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price strength fails to sustain $29,000 support as the week begins with fresh weakness for Bitcoin.

item.title: Telegram crypto bots gain momentum in the market: Binance Research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Daily volumes of crypto trades with Telegram bots hit a record high of $10 million in July, according to a new report by Binance Research.

item.title: CoinsPaid claims North Korean hacking group used fake job interview to steal $37M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Hackers attempted to infiltrate CoinsPaid infrastructure directly starting in March 2023 but switched their approach to targeting individuals through fake high-salary job offers.

item.title: India House passes bill to ease Big Tech data compliance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The lower house in the parliament of India approved updates to a bill that would ease data storage, processing and transfer standards for Big Tech companies.
